{{Description|Name: Gleaming Lamp<br>Note: Installing different Brilliant Mirrors will grant the corresponding colors to the Lamp's light.|[https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/en/news/detail/112146 Veluriyam Mirage Adventure Invitation – Introducing the Version 3.8 Limited-Time Area]}}
'''Gleaming Lamps''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Veluriyam Mirage]] during the [[Secret Summer Paradise]] event.

Gleaming Lamps can illuminate '''Lamp Gems''' of the same color by installing a '''Brilliant Mirror''' of the same color.

If the player walks into the path of a Gleaming Lamp of a different color than the Brilliant Mirror they are carrying, including uncolored light, the Brilliant Mirror will be removed and returned to its original position.
